verbose_text: The result suggests that human HIF-lalpha expression knocked down by miRNA can significantly reduce A549 cell invasion under normoxic and hypoxic conditions, but re-expression of survivin by transfection of expression vectors in the HIF-lalpha knockdown cells does not promote invasive activity regardless of hypoxic or normoxic conditions (XREF_FIG).
evidence: HIF-lalpha expression knocked down by miRNA can significantly reduce A549 cell invasion
